plot: Depicts the process of grieving that Ming goes through with her father (Leung) in the sudden death of her mother. As both characters grieve in their own ways, they are forced to face the past, the regrets and eventually, each other.
title: Linger
plot_es: Depicts the process of grieving that Ming goes through with her father (Leung) in the sudden death of her mother. As both characters grieve in their own ways, they are forced to face the past, the regrets and eventually, each other.

produce.name: Screen, School of Creative Media, RMIT University
